feature.label: CORE SYSTEM MODULE
feature.title: Technical Gameplay Features
feature.description: Block Burst is built on a lightweight, modular gameplay architecture optimized for mobile performance, fast iteration, and extensibility.

features.title: Grid & Board System
features.description: A deterministic grid-based system responsible for placement logic, validation, and state tracking.

items.title: 8x8 Grid Architecture
items.description: Grid represented as a data-driven 2D array; Each cell stores occupancy state and block metadata.

items.title: Fast Placement Validation
items.description: Bounds and collision checks executed only on affected cells; No physics-based logic.

items.title: Partial Grid Scanning
items.description: Row and column scans limited to impacted areas after placement for better performance.

items.title: Grid State Isolation
items.description: Grid logic separated from rendering and input for easier testing and simulation.

features.title: Block Shape System
features.description: A flexible block definition system designed for easy expansion and controlled randomness.

items.title: Shape Matrix Definitions
items.description: Block shapes stored as Vector2 sets with original position is (0, 0).

items.title: Scriptable Shape Data
items.description: Block shapes defined via ScriptableObjects for tuning and reuse.

items.title: Weighted Random Generator
items.description: Prevents impossible board states by controlling shape frequency and complexity.

items.title: Ghost Preview Support
items.description: Real-time placement preview aligned to grid cells during drag interaction.

features.title: Turn & Game State Logic
features.description: Stateless-friendly turn handling and deterministic game flow.

items.title: Turn-Based Block Spawning
items.description: Each turn generates exactly three blocks; not randomly but based on free spaces on board.

items.title: Game Over Detection
items.description: Evaluates all remaining block shapes against grid state only when required.

items.title: Instant Restart Support
items.description: No scene reload required; Grid and state reset via data reinitialization.

features.title: Line Clear & Scoring System
features.description: Event-driven logic for clearing rows, columns, and calculating scores.

items.title: Row & Column Detection
items.description: Simultaneous multi-line detection supported in a single placement.

items.title: Two-Phase Clear Pipeline
items.description: Mark → animate → clear → VFX to keep visuals and data in sync.

items.title: Modular Score Calculation
items.description: Base score, multi-line bonus, and combo logic handled via a scoring pipeline.

items.title: Event-Based Score Updates
items.description: UI, audio, and effects subscribe to score events instead of direct calls.

features.title: Input & Interaction Layer
features.description: Unified input handling for touch and mouse with responsive feedback.

items.title: Unified Drag System
items.description: Single input layer supporting both mouse and touch interactions.

items.title: Soft Snap Placement
items.description: Forgiving snap-to-grid behavior for better mobile feel.

items.title: Invalid Placement Feedback
items.description: Immediate visual and animation response when placement fails.

features.title: Visual & Theme System
features.description: Data-driven visual setup decoupled from gameplay logic.

items.title: Theme Configuration
items.description: Colors, block styles, and grid visuals defined via theme data.

items.title: Runtime Theme Switching
items.description: Themes can be swapped without affecting gameplay state.

items.title: Animation Hooks
items.description: Placement and clear animations triggered through gameplay events.

features.title: Performance & Optimization
features.description: Designed for smooth gameplay on low-end mobile devices.

items.title: Allocation-Free Core Loop
items.description: No runtime blinding memory allocations during active gameplay.

items.title: Logic-Only Gameplay Core
items.description: Grid and block logic use pure math and arrays; No physics dependency.

features.title: Persistence & Data
features.description: Simple, reliable local data storage with room to scale.

items.title: Local Save System
items.description: Stores best score, settings, and theme selection locally.

items.title: JSON-Friendly Structure
items.description: Save data structured for easy migration or cloud sync later.
